Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/research/1794139532778795008/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Criticize"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/research/1794139532778795008/)_"
---
[TARGETLANGUAGE]  Act as a harsh critic and provide
brutally honest feedback about
this [Keyword]. Convince me
why its bad .
Act as an expert on the fiel of the topic of  [Keyword] and sugggest improvements on [Keyword].
[PROMPT]
 Let's think step by step.
At the end add a summarization of the answer with some bullet points.
PromptHint: [Language] [Link, Title, Email, Song Name, Bussines Model ] to criticize + your own [PROMPT]
